segments.text: I just saw Something About Mary last night . It was hilarious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: David took me to it last week . I thought it was a little sick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean sick ? It was really funny , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was entertaining in some ways . But in general I didn't like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just think the humor was too gross . There were too many disgusting things in it . I don't think a comedy has to have so much smut to be funny .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It wasn't a dirty movie . There wasn't even any nudity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you're right . But nudity doesn't bother me . What bothered me were all the jokes about masturbation , stuff like that . It was too sick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you are too conservative . It's just realistic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think it's realistic . I thought it was sick . Why does a movie have to use that kind of humor ?
segments.speaker: S2
